conversation.text: I would recommend "The Relic". It's a classic science fiction movie that stars Edward Fox and Maximilian Schell. The movie is about an expedition to find the lost city of Atlantis, which according legend was destroyed by a great flood. Along the way, the expedition discovers the ruins of an ancient civilization that predates Atlantis. This civilization is believed to be the lost city of Lemuria, which according legend was destroyed by a great flood as well. The expedition also discovers the remains of an advanced alien race that predates both Lemuria and Atlantis.
